animals.name: Fox
features: Task: Jump 1 meter forward.
Task: Sneak around and playfully startle someone.

animals.name: Fish
features: Task: Swim gracefully through a space, imitating a fish's movements.
Task: Create a sleek and streamlined drawing or design.

animals.name: Alligator
features: Task: Demonstrate strength through a physical activity.
Task: Wear an outfit that exudes power and timelessness.

animals.name: Penguin
features: Task: Waddle in a distinctive and charming manner.
Task: Support a friend in their unique endeavors.

animals.name: Beaver
features: Task: Build something creative using everyday materials.
Task: Cooperate with others on a project or task.

animals.name: Bulldog
features: Task: Demonstrate loyalty by sticking to a commitment.
Task: Tackle a challenging task with determination.

animals.name: Dino
features: Task: Stand out in a crowd, showcasing your unique qualities.
Task: Explore a new place or concept with a sense of wonder.

animals.name: Dog
features: Task: Express loyalty and affection to a friend or family member.
Task: Approach a task or challenge with a friendly attitude.

animals.name: Elephant
features: Task: Show kindness by helping someone in need.
Task: Create an elegant and majestic piece of art.

animals.name: Hippo
features: Task: Be confident in expressing your unique qualities.
Task: Wear a cheerful and laid-back outfit for the day.

animals.name: Monkey
features: Task: Playfully imitate a monkey's antics and bring joy to others.
Task: Engage in a spontaneous and adventurous activity.

animals.name: Panda
features: Task: Create harmony in your surroundings.
Task: Embrace a gentle and peaceful mindset throughout the day.

animals.name: Parrot
features: Task: Engage in colorful and lively conversations with others.
Task: Express yourself creatively, whether through art or words.

animals.name: Seal
features: Task: Showcase a unique talent or ability you possess.
Task: Adapt gracefully to changes in your routine or plans.

animals.name: Tiger
features: Task: Face a challenge with courage and determination.
Task: Wear a bold and fierce outfit or accessory.

animals.name: Turtle
features: Task: Demonstrate patience in a situation that tests it.
Task: Wear a composed and wise outfit for the day.

animals.name: White Bear
features: Task: Show resilience in overcoming a challenge.
Task: Wear an outfit that exudes both warmth and strength.
